content: Can you describe the project a bit more?
replace this componetn. with uniswap-style crypto swapping widget for buying into scottys gigachad coin, with options for placholder tokens to buy in with (swapping eth for example, with scottycoin)
Affirmative response: "Absolutely, integrating a Uniswap-style widget for Gigachad coin purchases with multiple token options."

{"status": "success", "ui_elements_checklist": [{"feature": "Integrate real-time crypto price charts for Scottycoin and placeholder tokens", "checked": true}, {"feature": "Implement a transaction history feature to track past swaps and investments", "checked": false}, {"feature": "Add a 'Favorites' feature to quickly access preferred placeholder tokens", "checked": true}, {"feature": "Introduce advanced security features such as 2FA for transactions", "checked": false}, {"feature": "Incorporate a wallet connectivity option for popular wallets like MetaMask or Trust Wallet", "checked": true}, {"feature": "Enable push notifications for transaction confirmations and significant price changes", "checked": false}], "input_token_count": 272, "output_token_count": 137, "time_taken": "0:00:05.370340"}
